description: Dining phrases for ordering food, dietary needs, and restaurant interactions

phrases.english: Could I see the menu?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galėčiau pamatyti meniu? Ar turite vegetarišką variantą?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Could I see the menu? Do you have a vegetarian option?

phrases.english: I would like to order...
phrases.exampleSentence: Aš norėčiau užsisakyti cepelinų ir šaltos arbatos.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I would like to order cepelinai and cold tea.

phrases.english: Could I get the bill?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galėčiau gauti sąskaitą? Ar priimate kreditines korteles?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Could I get the bill? Do you accept credit cards?

phrases.english: Do you have tables available tonight?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar turite vietų šiam vakarui? Mums reikia staliuko keturiems.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Do you have tables available tonight? We need a table for four.

phrases.english: What is the dish of the day?
phrases.exampleSentence: Kas yra dienos patiekalas? Ar jis aštrus?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: What is the dish of the day? Is it spicy?

phrases.english: I'm allergic to...
phrases.exampleSentence: Aš esu alergiškas riešutams. Ar šiame patiekale jų yra?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I'm allergic to nuts. Does this dish contain any?

phrases.english: Can you serve it without meat?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galite patiekti be mėsos? Aš vegetaras/vegetarė.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can you serve it without meat? I'm a vegetarian.

phrases.english: The food is excellent! Compliments to the chef
phrases.exampleSentence: Maistas puikus! Komplimentai virėjui. Tikrai grįšime.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: The food is excellent! Compliments to the chef. We'll definitely come back.

phrases.english: Can I get a doggy bag?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galiu gauti doggy bag? Nebaigiau valgyti, bet sotus.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can I get a doggy bag? I didn't finish eating, but I'm full.

phrases.english: Waiter, could you come here?
phrases.exampleSentence: Padavėjau, ar galite prieiti? Norėčiau dar vieno gėrimo.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Waiter, could you come here? I'd like another drink.

phrases.english: Do you accept credit cards?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar priimate kreditines korteles? Aš neturiu grynųjų pinigų.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Do you accept credit cards? I don't have cash.

phrases.english: Is the food served hot?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar maitas patiekiamas karštas? Norėčiau, kad būtų šiltas.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is the food served hot? I would like it to be warm.

phrases.english: I'm looking for a healthy option.
phrases.exampleSentence: Aš ieškau sveiko pasirinkimo. Ar galėtumėte ką nors rekomenduoti?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I'm looking for a healthy option. Could you recommend something?

phrases.english: Does the meal include a drink?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar į patiekalą įeina gėrimas? Jei ne, užsisakysiu atskirai.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Does the meal include a drink? If not, I'll order one separately.

phrases.english: Could we get some more napkins?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galime gauti papildomų servetėlių? Vaikams jų prireiks.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Could we get some more napkins? The kids will need them.

phrases.english: Does the dish have a lot of salt?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar patiekalas turi daug druskos? Man reikia mažo sūraus maisto.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Does the dish have a lot of salt? I need low-sodium food.

phrases.english: Please, less ice in my drink.
phrases.exampleSentence: Prašau gerti su mažiau ledo, nes per daug šaltas.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Please, less ice in my drink because it's too cold.

phrases.english: Is there Wi-Fi here?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar čia yra belaidis ryšys? Norėčiau naudoti savo telefoną.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is there Wi-Fi here? I'd like to use my phone.

phrases.english: The drink is too sweet for me.
phrases.exampleSentence: Gėrimas yra per saldus man. Ar galite padaryti jį mažiau saldų?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: The drink is too sweet for me. Can you make it less sweet?

phrases.english: Thank you, I've had enough.
phrases.exampleSentence: Ačiū, aš jau pavalgiau. Visa buvo puiku!
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Thank you, I've had enough. Everything was amazing!

phrases.english: Are the salads served with dressing?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar salotos patiekiamos su padažu? Norėčiau jų be jo.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Are the salads served with dressing? I would like them without it.

phrases.english: Is this a seasonal dish?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar tai sezoninis patiekalas? Ieškau naudoti šviežius produktus.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is this a seasonal dish? I'm looking for fresh ingredients.

phrases.english: Can I have a kid's portion?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galiu gauti vaikų porciją? Man mažai reikia.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can I have a kid's portion? I don't need much.

phrases.english: How many calories does this dish have?
phrases.exampleSentence: Kiek kalorijų turi šis patiekalas? Bandau valgyti sveikiau.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: How many calories does this dish have? I'm trying to eat healthier.

phrases.english: I didn't like this dish.
phrases.exampleSentence: Man nepatiko šis patiekalas. Gal galite pakeisti jį kitu?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I didn't like this dish. Could you replace it with something else?

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galiu paragauti vyno prieš užsisakydamas?
phrases.english: Can I taste the wine before ordering?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galiu paragauti vyno prieš užsisakydamas? Noriu įsitikinti, kad jis man tinka.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can I taste the wine before ordering? I want to make sure it's suitable for me.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galite pasiūlyti be aštraus skonio variantą?
phrases.english: Can you suggest a non-spicy option?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galite pasiūlyti be aštraus skonio variantą? Man nepatinka stipriai aštrus maistas.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can you suggest a non-spicy option? I don't like overly spicy food.

phrases.english: Could you bring sparkling water?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galite atnešti gaivų vandenį? Aš renkuosi be ledo.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Could you bring sparkling water? I prefer it without ice.

phrases.english: Do you have an allergy menu?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar jūs turite alergijų meniu? Man reikia būti atsargiam dėl ingredientų.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Do you have an allergy menu? I need to be cautious about the ingredients.

phrases.english: Is the buffet still open?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar bufetas dar atidarytas? Norėčiau patikrinti, ką turite.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is the buffet still open? I'd like to see what you have.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galėtumėt pridėti daugiau padažo prie mano patiekalo?
phrases.english: Could you add more sauce to my dish?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galėtumėt pridėti daugiau padažo prie mano patiekalo? Jis atrodo kiek sausas.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Could you add more sauce to my dish? It seems a bit dry.

phrases.english: What is your most popular dish?
phrases.exampleSentence: Koks yra jūsų populiariausias patiekalas? Noriu išbandyti kažką rekomenduojamo.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: What is your most popular dish? I want to try something recommended.

phrases.english: Can I order a half portion?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galiu užsisakyti pusę porcijos? Visa porcija yra man per didelė.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can I order a half portion? A full portion is too much for me.

phrases.english: Is this gluten-free?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar tai be glitimo? Aš turiu glitimo netoleranciją.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is this gluten-free? I have gluten intolerance.

phrases.english: How is this dish prepared?
phrases.exampleSentence: Kaip gaminamas šis patiekalas? Noriu išgirsti apie jį daugiau.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: How is this dish prepared? I’d like to hear more about it.

phrases.lithuanian: Šis patiekalas nėra toks, kokio tikėjausi.
phrases.english: This dish is not what I expected.
phrases.exampleSentence: Šis patiekalas nėra toks, kokio tikėjausi. Ar galime tai aptarti su padavėju?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: This dish is not what I expected. Can we discuss this with the waiter?

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galiu gauti šiek tiek pipirų?
phrases.english: Can I get some pepper?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galiu gauti šiek tiek pipirų? Mano sriubai trūksta aštrumo.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can I get some pepper? My soup needs a bit more spice.

phrases.english: Could you reheat my dish?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galėtumėte pašildyti mano patiekalą? Jis jau yra per šaltas.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Could you reheat my dish? It's already too cold.

phrases.lithuanian: Kokia yra laukimo trukmė šiuo metu?
phrases.english: What is the current waiting time?
phrases.exampleSentence: Kokia yra laukimo trukmė šiuo metu? Nenorėčiau per ilgai laukti.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: What is the current waiting time? I wouldn’t want to wait too long.

phrases.english: Could you bring more bread?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galėtumėt atnešti daugiau duonos? Pirmoji porcija buvo nuostabi.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Could you bring more bread? The first portion was amazing.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galima šio patiekalo sudedamųjų dalių keitimas?
phrases.english: Can the ingredients of this dish be modified?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galima šio patiekalo sudedamųjų dalių keitimas? Noriu mažiau pieno produktų.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can the ingredients of this dish be modified? I want to reduce dairy.

phrases.english: Where can I find the restroom?
phrases.exampleSentence: Kur galima rasti tualetą? Gal galėtumėte parodyti kelią?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Where can I find the restroom? Could you show me the way?

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galite patikrinti, ar mano užsakymas paruoštas?
phrases.english: Could you check if my order is ready?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galite patikrinti, ar mano užsakymas paruoštas? Atrodo, jog laukiu ilgai.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Could you check if my order is ready? It seems like I've been waiting a while.

phrases.lithuanian: Kurioji suma bus pridedama už aptarnavimą?
phrases.english: Which amount will be added for service?
phrases.exampleSentence: Kurioji suma bus pridedama už aptarnavimą? Noriu žinoti visas galutines išlaidas.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Which amount will be added for service? I want to know the final costs.

phrases.english: Do you offer lactose-free options?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar siūlote galimybes be laktozės? Man reikia tokio maitinimo dėl sveikatos priežasčių.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Do you offer lactose-free options? I need this due to health reasons.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galime gauti dar vieną meniu?
phrases.english: Can we get another menu?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galime gauti dar vieną meniu? Mes norime pasidalinti jį tarp mūsų.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can we get another menu? We want to share it amongst us.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galite nurodyti, kurie patiekalai yra be riešutų?
phrases.english: Can you indicate which dishes are nut-free?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galite nurodyti, kurie patiekalai yra be riešutų? Pas mus alergiškumų.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can you indicate which dishes are nut-free? Someone in our group has allergies.

phrases.english: Is this coffee freshly brewed?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar ši kava šviežiai paruošta? Man svarbu skonio kokybė.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is this coffee freshly brewed? The quality of taste is important to me.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galėtumėt pašalinti svogūnus iš salotų?
phrases.english: Could you remove onions from the salad?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galėtumėt pašalinti svogūnus iš salotų? Man jie netinka.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Could you remove onions from the salad? They don't suit me.

phrases.english: Is there a special winter menu?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar yra speciali žiemos meniu? Noriu išbandyti sezoninį pasiūlymą.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is there a special winter menu? I'd like to try seasonal offerings.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galite patiekti maistą anksčiau už gėrimus?
phrases.english: Can you serve the food before the drinks?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galite patiekti maistą anksčiau už gėrimus? Mes esame labai alkani.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can you serve the food before the drinks? We are very hungry.

phrases.english: Is it possible to sit outside?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galima sėdėti lauke? Norėtume mėgautis vakaro oru.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is it possible to sit outside? We'd like to enjoy the evening air.

phrases.english: Do you have low-calorie options?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar turite mažiau kaloringų pasirinkimų? Siekiu labiau sveikuoliško gyvenimo būdo.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Do you have low-calorie options? I'm aiming for a healthier lifestyle.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galime užsisakyti desertą dabar, o ne po vakarienės?
phrases.english: Can we order dessert now instead of after dinner?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galime užsisakyti desertą dabar, o ne po vakarienės? Esame labai saldžių patiekalų mėgėjai.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can we order dessert now instead of after dinner? We are big fans of sweets.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar turite akcijų ar specialių pasiūlymų šiandien?
phrases.english: Do you have any deals or special offers today?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar turite akcijų ar specialių pasiūlymų šiandien? Norėtume sutaupyti.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Do you have any deals or special offers today? We'd like to save money.

phrases.english: Is the food available for takeaway?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar maistas patiekiamas į namus? Norėtume jį pasiimti vėliau.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is the food available for takeaway? We’d like to pick it up later.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galite pasiūlyti patiekalą be pridėtinio cukraus?
phrases.english: Can you suggest a dish with no added sugar?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galite pasiūlyti patiekalą be pridėtinio cukraus? Aš stebiu savo cukraus suvartojimą.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can you suggest a dish with no added sugar? I'm monitoring my sugar intake.

phrases.lithuanian: Koks yra jūsų darbo laikas savaitgaliais?
phrases.english: What are your opening hours on weekends?
phrases.exampleSentence: Koks yra jūsų darbo laikas savaitgaliais? Mes norime atvykti šeštadienio vakarą.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: What are your opening hours on weekends? We want to visit on Saturday evening.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar yra kas nors be laktozės desertų?
phrases.english: Are there any lactose-free desserts?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar yra kas nors be laktozės desertų? Man norėtųsi ko nors švelnaus.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Are there any lactose-free desserts? I’d like something mild.

phrases.english: Can you serve the sauce separately?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galite atskirai patiekti padažą? Norėčiau pats reguliuoti jo kiekį.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can you serve the sauce separately? I'd like to control the quantity myself.

phrases.english: Is this table reserved?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar šis staliukas yra rezervuotas? Jei ne, mes mielai prie jo sėsime.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is this table reserved? If not, we'd be happy to sit here.

phrases.lithuanian: Kaip stipriai jums rekomenduojama šis vynas?
phrases.english: How strongly do you recommend this wine?
phrases.exampleSentence: Kaip stipriai jums rekomenduojama šis vynas? Esame smalsūs apie jo skonį.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: How strongly do you recommend this wine? We are curious about its taste.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galiu gauti sąskaitą su detaliais patiekalų aprašymais?
phrases.english: Can I get a bill with detailed descriptions of the dishes?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galiu gauti sąskaitą su detaliais patiekalų aprašymais? Noriu stebėti savo išlaidas.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can I get a bill with detailed descriptions of the dishes? I want to monitor my spending.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar stalelis gali būti šalia lango?
phrases.english: Can the table be next to a window?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar stalelis gali būti šalia lango? Norėtume mėgautis vaizdu.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can the table be next to a window? We'd like to enjoy the view.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galite pasiūlyti rekomendaciją dėl tinkamo garnyro?
phrases.english: Could you suggest a good side dish?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galite pasiūlyti rekomendaciją dėl tinkamo garnyro? Mūsų pagrindiniam patiekalui jo pritrūksta.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Could you suggest a good side dish? Our main course could use it.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galite pasakyti, ar šis patiekalas yra populiarus tarp klientų?
phrases.english: Could you tell me if this dish is popular among customers?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galite pasakyti, ar šis patiekalas yra populiarus tarp klientų? Norime išbandyti kažką mėgstamo.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Could you tell me if this dish is popular among customers? We want to try something loved.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galėtumėte patarti, kuri sriuba tinkamesnė vaikams?
phrases.english: Could you advise which soup is more suitable for kids?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galėtumėte patarti, kuri sriuba tinkamesnė vaikams? Ieškome mažiau aštraus varianto.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Could you advise which soup is more suitable for kids? We are looking for a less spicy option.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galima pasidalinti vieną patiekalą su dviem žmonėmis?
phrases.english: Is it possible to share a single dish between two people?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galima pasidalinti vieną patiekalą su dviem žmonėmis? Jis atrodo labai didelis.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is it possible to share a single dish between two people? It looks very large.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar šis restoranas siūlo pietų rinkinį?
phrases.english: Does this restaurant offer a lunch combo?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar šis restoranas siūlo pietų rinkinį? Mes norėtume šiek tiek sutaupyti.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Does this restaurant offer a lunch combo? We'd like to save a bit.

phrases.english: Can we make a reservation for dinner?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galime rezervuoti staliuką vakarienei? Mums reikia stalo ketvirtadieniui 19 val.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can we make a reservation for dinner? We need a table for Thursday at 7 PM.
